title: New Player Looking For People To Play With / Learn From
body:
Hi all!
I played with a small group of friends back in 2012. I have not touched since the game since then. I've decided to pick it back up and would love to find a community or clan of people to play with. Im 25 years old, so would prefer a "mature" community if possible. 
Thanks all!

replies.body: mature is hard to find in this game.

-LoL
-Mature

Pick one.

I say that kindly since now its people afking after 1 death, or being offended by anything.
